channel.title: OldRS - Blast from the Past || Quests || PVP || All Skills || Interactable World
channel.description:
[IMG]http://oldrs.org/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img] [size=12pt]BETA NOW OPEN!![/size] [size=10pt]Play at: [url=http://www.oldrs.org]www.oldrs.org[/url][/size]
OldRS is a hyperion-based private server which aims to emulate runescape's 377 (will possibly upgrade to 459) revision. I know people are tired of seeing all these remakes out there, but I decided to continue working on this revision to increase my personal knowledge with java (my college major is software engineer) and because I enjoy playing around on a [B]decent[/B] oldschool server.
My Goal for this server is to create a fun, free alternative to oldschool RS, perhaps with a faster XP rate to increase the game pace.
So without further ado, I present to you: OldRS!
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120131231040/runescape/images/0/05/Quest_icon.png[/img] [B]Quests[/B]

@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:13, topic:537451”][quote author=south-park link=topic=656272.msg4397048#msg4397048 date=1389466213]
Logged on, tested a few things and noticed it was 2006Scape.
[/quote]

shut up. the pictures he used of the combat was from canownueazys hyperion combat clean up source. unless he used those for false adv, then hes not using 2006. we all know you used it, doesnt mean everyone and their brother did[/quote]

I’m not using it anymore. Also, I know that everyone knew that I used it, hell I even gave them credits.

OT: He used it for false advertisement. Don’t believe me? Log-in and check it out. I highly, highly doubt it’s hyperion, unless he can 100% prove it.

item.title: OldRS - Blast from the Past || Quests || PVP || All Skills || Interactable World
item.dc:creator: @OldRS OldRS
item.description:
@OldRS wrote:


[size=12pt]BETA NOW OPEN!![/size]
[size=10pt]Play at: www.oldrs.org[/size]

OldRS is a hyperion-based private server which aims to emulate runescape’s 377 (will possibly upgrade to 459) revision. I know people are tired of seeing all these remakes out there, but I decided to continue working on this revision to increase my personal knowledge with java (my college major is software engineer) and because I enjoy playing around on a [B]decent[/B] oldschool server.

My Goal for this server is to create a fun, free alternative to oldschool RS, perhaps with a faster XP rate to increase the game pace.

So without further ado, I present to you: OldRS!

[B]Quests[/B]

[ul][li][color=green]Perfect Replica’s of RS Quests[/COLOR]
[list][li][color=green]Cook’s Assistant[/COLOR] ([URL=http://i.imgur.com/1Y4NTb1.png]Pic[/URL])
[/li][li][color=green]Doric’s Quest[/COLOR] ([URL=http://i.imgur.com/DJXB8yC.png]Pic[/URL])
